content.rendered:
Financial aid staff are available for counseling sessions virtually, by phone, and in-person to address questions about the financial aid process: how to file the Free Application for Federal Student Aid (FAFSA), the financial aid offer and how to read it, and options available to fund your education.

To schedule a counseling session with your financial aid counselor, select an appointment calendar below based on the first letter of your last name.

Payment Arrangement Appointments

If you have registered for classes and have questions about how to make payment arrangements, you should contact the Office of Student Accounts to set up a payment plan or schedule an appointment with student accounts.
